nsrc: Payments Testing Guide: Ensure Flawless Checkouts
Payment gateways are the vital financial link between customer and business. You risk a lost sale if a customer encounters even a minor issue during checkout.

Payment gateway testing mimics each step of the payment process to verify that connections, transactions, and paths for communications are working. Testers uncover issues that impact a seamless transaction and user experience.
This guide provides a full overview of payments testing, from definitions to use cases to actionable testing scenarios.
